---
title: "Minimal DOCX/PDF Quarto Doc"
format: pdf
---

```{r}
library(d3r)
script = '
const width = 400;
const height = 200;
const svg = d3.select("#container")
  .append("svg")
  .attr("width", width)
  .attr("height", height);
// Define a simple path (triangle)
const pathData = "M 100 150 L 200 50 L 300 150 Z"; // A simple triangle

// Append a path
const path = svg.append("path")
  .attr("d", pathData)
  .attr("fill", "steelblue")
  .attr("stroke", "black")
  .attr("stroke-width", 2)
  .on("click", function() {
    // Change color on click
    d3.select(this).attr("fill", "tomato");
});'
make(script = script, mode = 'selenium') |> rsvg::rsvg_pdf("out.pdf")
# conversion to PDF is not needed when format is DOCX
knitr::include_graphics("out.pdf")
```
